column6:
The Mandarin's plan kicks into overdrive as he infiltrates Stark Industries -- and you'll never guess who he sends! Plus what is the Scarecrow's secret connection to the Mandarin? The pulse-pounding saga of Iron Man's first war with his greatest enemy continues here! Guest-starring the Crimson Dynamo! ,2007,11
Rated A ...$2.99
column8: | letterer:Comicraft | penciller (cover):Eric Canete | writer:Joe Casey | colorist:Dave Stewart
